messages.message: Hi, when changing datatypes from anything to Document reasoning. the prompt seems to vanish away making the user to almost retype the prompt again. in cases of a long prompt. it is almost impossible to replicate the same prompt. Screencap below and EPD Bug EPD-3033  (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-3033)
I think I've reported a similar thing with custom function fields. If you change to reasoning and then back I believe you lose that code you've written
this is expected and is tracked by https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-2467
